name: Space Vikings
description:
Space Vikings combines arena shooter and dungeon crawler gameplay elements in a sci-fi rogue-lite package.

Play as a member of the Space Vikings crew, each with their own stats and perks!


Arm yourself with powerful and unusual weapons!


Use the map to explore mysterious alien planets in search of loot and plunder!


Battle alien creatures until you're the only one standing and reap the rewards!


Upgrade your guns with powerful augments!
